snippet: The National Transportation Safety Board planned to send investigators to look into why a small Hageland Aviation plane crashed.
abstract: Plane operated by Hageland Aviation crashes near remote Alaskan town of St Mary's, killing pilot and three passengers.
lead_paragraph: The National Transportation Safety Board planned to send investigators to look into why a small Hageland Aviation plane crashed.

headline.main: Pilot and 3 Passengers Killed in a Plane Crash in Alaska
headline.print_headline: Pilot and 3 Passengers Killed In a Plane Crash in Alaska
